2.text: Stop standing there and lend me a hand!)

5.name: Mick
5.text: Wait a minute, you can understand me?

7.name: Mick
7.text: That's great and all, but don't you dare use it on me by pressing [color][ui_select][/color] and selecting it within the [color]PSI menu[/color].

8.name: Mick
8.text: And don't even think of using it by simply holding down [color][ui_toggle][/color] and pressing [color][ui_accept][/color].)
